title: Mute annoying words on Twitter
description:
Batch mute words on twitter.com/x.com Features: 
1. Text selection to quick mute on word by on click 
2. Batch import and export mute words list. 
3. Ad block in feed stream
 4. Auto sync word list to x.com 
5. Hit count statistics, find most noisy accounts 
howtomute.com
